thread.title: Cute and affordable in Montmartre
thread.title_full: Cute and affordable in Montmartre - Review of Hotel des Arts - Montmartre, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Edward T
title: Cute and affordable in Montmartre
text: The hotel is cute! The rooms are small, but not too small - a great base for exploring the city. We had a room with a view of the Eiffel Tower. The staff was exceptionally friendly and helpful - booking an airport shuttle, suggesting restaurants, printing out museum tickets. The area was great, and the hotel was affordable. It was a very pleasant experience.
